mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.`name`, IFNULL(a.file_path, a.default_file_path) filePath, IFNULL(a.file_name, a.default_file_name) fileName FROM sm_project_page a WHERE a.sm_project_id = #{proId} ORDER BY a.sort DESC
SELECT a.default_file_path_num redisFilePathNum FROM sm_project_page a ORDER BY a.default_file_path_num DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT a.default_file_name_num redisFileNameNum FROM sm_project_page a ORDER BY a.default_file_name_num DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT a.sort sort FROM sm_project_page a WHERE a.sm_project_id = #{proId} ORDER BY a.sort DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT into sm_project_page (id, name, file_path, file_name, default_file_path, default_file_name, default_file_path_num, default_file_name_num, sm_project_id, sort, create_id, create_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{filePath}, #{fileName}, #{defaultFilePath}, #{defaultFileName}, #{defaultFilePathNum}, #{defaultFileNameNum}, #{proId}, #{sort}, #{createId}, #{createTime})
